name: eno
description: ðŸš€Easy to compile ts, tsx, scss, less, stylus, jade, pug and es6+ on save without using a build task.

compile-hero.disable-compile-files-on-di.description: Disable compile files on did save code.

compile-hero.javascript-output-directory.description: Set the directory to output after compiling javascript.

compile-hero.sass-output-directory.description: Set the directory to output after compiling sass.

compile-hero.scss-output-directory.description: Set the directory to output after compiling sass.

compile-hero.less-output-directory.description: Set the directory to output after compiling less.

compile-hero.stylus-output-directory.description: Set the directory to output after compiling stylus.

compile-hero.jade-output-directory.description: Set the directory to output after compiling jade.

compile-hero.typescript-output-directory.description: Set the directory to output after compiling typescript.

compile-hero.typescriptx-output-director.description: Set the directory to output after compiling typescriptx.

compile-hero.pug-output-directory.description: Set the directory to output after compiling pug.

compile-hero.javascript-output-toggle.description: Switch to control the compilation of javascript.

compile-hero.sass-output-toggle.description: Switch to control the compilation of sass.

compile-hero.scss-output-toggle.description: Switch to control the compilation of sass.

compile-hero.less-output-toggle.description: Switch to control the compilation of less.

compile-hero.stylus-output-toggle.description: Switch to control the compilation of stylus.

compile-hero.jade-output-toggle.description: Switch to control the compilation of jade.

compile-hero.typescript-output-toggle.description: Switch to control the compilation of typescript.

compile-hero.typescriptx-output-toggle.description: Switch to control the compilation of typescriptx.

compile-hero.pug-output-toggle.description: Switch to control the compilation of pug.

compile-hero.generate-minified-html.description: Enable to generate minified html (*.min.html) files.

compile-hero.generate-minified-css.description: Enable to generate minified css (*.min.css) files.

compile-hero.generate-minified-javascrip.description: Enable to generate minified javascript (*.dev.js) files.

compile-hero.ignore.description: List of paths to ignore when using format or compile command, including format or compile on save, uses glob pattern matching.

compile-hero.config.description: A path to a file, or an object containing the configuration options for js-beautify, if the .jsbeautifyrc file exists in project root, it overrides this configuration.

compile-hero.language.description: Link file types to the beautifier type.

js.description: Array of language types, or an object containing types, extensions and filenames to associate

css.description: Array of language types, or an object containing types, extensions and filenames to associate

html.description: Array of language types, or an object containing types, extensions and filenames to associate

scripts.build: npm run build:delete.vsix && npm run build:compile.hero && npm run build:beautify
